services.title: For the Little Ones:
services.description: DJ Fitz transforms kids' birthdays into epic celebrations with themed music that'll have them dancing and laughing non-stop.
features: Special Effects (Bubble machine, light shows, etc)

services.title: For the Adults
services.description: Ready to groove with your favorite tunes? DJ Fitz offers a wide variety of mixes that hit just the right note. His extensive selection ensures that every gues finds something to love, keeping the party vibe alive from start to finish.

services.title: Mixed Events
services.description: Birthday parties, anniversaries, graduations - whatever the occasion, FJ Fitz brings an unbeatable mix of enthusiasm, skill, and an eclectic selection of music.
features: Discounts or special packages for clients booking both children's and adult services

pricing.note: Pricing varies based on event duration, location, and requirements. Contact for a custom quote.
